keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money and defence
Let's make Parliament serve the people
Keep investing, better management, less waste
Spend £100bn on transport and jobs in the regions
We need a fair, firm points-based system

issues.brexitEurope: A Clean-Break Brexit: We must control our laws, borders, money and defence
issues.defence: A Clean-Break Brexit: We must control our laws, borders, money and defence
issues.governance: Fundamental Democratic Reform: Let's make Parliament serve the people
issues.health: Supporting the NHS: Keep investing, better management, less waste
issues.immigration: Controlled Immigration: We need a fair, firm points-based system
issues.transport: A Brexit Dividend: Spend £100bn on transport and jobs in the regions

leaflet.personalStatement: It is a privilege to be your Parliamentary Candidate for the General Election. Born in East London, and a local resident for two decades, I am not a career politician. Like many of you, I believe the established parties are no longer fit for purpose. Husband and father of dual-national children, I do not feel there is a contradiction between having a positive international outlook, and wanting the UK to be free of undemocratic EU rule. In Leyton and Wanstead I want to fight for the very best public services, safe streets and an economy that works for us all.
